alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:29PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clayton and southern Fayette Counties through 800 PM CST... At 728 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aurora, or 8 miles east of Oelwein, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Strawberry Point around 735 PM CST. Volga around 740 PM CST. Elkader around 745 PM CST. Garnavillo and Farmersburg around 750 PM CST. McGregor and Marquette around 800 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Spook Cave Campground, Camp C.S. Klaus, Mederville, Giard, Highways 3 And 187, Bixby State Park, Highway 13 And County C 24, Fairview, National and County Road W 33 And 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
